1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Anas bin Malik said:"When the Prophet entered the toilet he would say: 'O Allah Indeed I seek refuge in You.'" Shu'bah (one of the narrators) said: "Another time he said: 'I seek refuge in You from AI-Khubthi and al-Khablth.' Or: 'Al-Khubthi and Al-Khaba'ith

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ إِذَا دَخَلَ الْخَلاَءَ
chapter.eng-name: What Is Said When entering The Toilet
